unit.name: Grand Sultan
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon and heavy armour.

unit.name: Grand Vizier
unit.description: Equipment: Spear, heavy armour and shield. The model may exchange its warhorse for a camel for free. Special Rules: Immune to Psychology, Grand Vizier, Heavy Cavalry

unit.name: Master Magician
unit.description: Magic: This model is a Level 4 wizard. Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Magician.

unit.name: Battle Standard
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon and light armour. Special Rules: none.

unit.name: Emir
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon and light armour. Special Rules: none

unit.name: Shaik
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon and light armour. The model may exchange its warhorse for a camel for free. Special Rules: Shaik.

unit.name: Battle Magician
unit.description: Magic: This model is a Level 2 wizard. Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Magician.

unit.name: Master Hashashin
unit.description: Equipment: Add. hand weapon. May be equipped with any poison. Special Rules: Scout, Dodge (4+), Concealed, No Leader.

unit.name: Spearman
unit.description: Equipment: Spear, light armour and Great Shield. Special Rules: Anti-Cav (spear).

unit.name: Bowman
unit.description: Equipment: Viper Bow. Special Rules: Volley Fire.

unit.name: Ghulam
unit.description: Mount: Warhorse. Equipment: Spear, light armour and shield. Special Rules: Feigned Flight, Ignores Difficult Terrain (camel only).

unit.name: Desert Rider
unit.description: Mount: Warhorse. Equipment: Spear, Viper Bow, light armour (or shield). Special Rules: Light Cavalry, Feigned Flight, Ignores Difficult Terrain (camel only).

unit.name: Mountain Warrior
unit.description: Equipment: Javelin and shield. Special Rules: Light Infantry, Feigned Flight.

unit.name: Mamluk
unit.description: Mount: Barded Warhorse. Equipment: Spear, heavy armour and shield.Special Rules: Heavy Cavalry, Ignores Difficult Terrain (camel only).

unit.name: Hashashin
unit.description: Equipment: Add. hand weapon. Special Rules: Scout, Skirmisher, Dodge (6+).

unit.name: Djinn
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Djinn, Fear.

unit.name: Naffatun
unit.description: Equipment: Blaze Globes. Special Rules: Skirmisher.

unit.name: Palace Guard
unit.description: Equipment: Spear, heavy armour and Great Shield. Special Rules: Stubborn, Bodyguard, Anti-Cav (spear).

unit.name: War Elephant
unit.description: Monster: 1 War Elephant and 3 Crew. Equipment: The crew is armed with javelins.. Special Rules: Terror, Large Target, Gregarious Animal, Howdah, Stampede, Scaly Skin (5+), Stubborn, Impact Hits (D3+2)

unit.name: Roc
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Flying Model, Large Target, Terror, March Blocker, MR2.

mount.name: Warhorse
mount.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: none.

mount.name: Barded Warhorse
mount.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: none.

mount.name: Camel
mount.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Ignores Difficult Terrain.

mount.name: Magic Carpet
mount.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Flying Model, Magic Carpet.

mount.name: War Elephant
mount.description: Monster: 1 War Elephant and 3 Crew. Equipment: The crew is armed with javelins.. Special Rules: Terror, Large Target, Gregarious Animal, Howdah, Stampede, Scaly Skin (5+), Stubborn, Impact Hits (D3+2)

item.name: Al Jizads Armour
item.description: Heavy armour, Attacker must pass a Strength test in cc for each attack or the attack fails.

item.name: Armour of El Diz
item.description: Light armour, Ward Save (5+)

item.name: Armour of Midday Sun
item.description: Heavy armour. Models that attack the bearer or its mount in cc or with a shooting attack suffer -1 to their to-hit rolls. Only attacks directed at the model itself are affected, i.e. if the model joined a unit, shooting at the unit does not suffer -1 to hit.

item.name: BM Breath of Embers
item.description: (8+) Place the tear drop template touching the caster in its front arc and determine hits using the template rules. All models hit suffer a S4 hit. If the caster is in cc, select one enemy unit that is in btb with the caster, this unit suffers D6 S4 hits.

item.name: BM Cleansing Flare
item.description: (10+) Each enemy unit within 12" suffers D6 S5 hits.

item.name: BM Curse of the Djinn
item.description: (7+) Hex, Range 24", target unit suffers -2 AS until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: BM Fire Ball
item.description: (5+) MM, Range 24", D6 S4 hits

item.name: BM Illusion of Terror
item.description: (8+) Hex, Range 18", needs LOS, target unit must take a panic test (Units that are Immune to Psychology are immune to this spell).

item.name: BM Quicksand
item.description: (9+) Hex, Range 18". Target unit halves its M (including mounts) and cannot declare a charge or charge even if it would be forced to (e.g. because of Frenzy). Units with Random Movement stop 1" in front of enemy units. Further, the target unit suffers -1 to to-hit rolls in cc. Lasts until the casters next magic phase. The spell has no effect on flyers.

item.name: Banner of Burning Faith
item.description: Unit gains Hatred.

item.name: Banner of Zandri
item.description: Bearer and his unit are Immune to Panic. Friendly units within 12" may reroll failed panic tests.

item.name: Banner of the Torrid Sun
B. of the Torrid Sun
item.description: The unit gains the special rules Frenzy and Stupidity.

item.name: Blaze Globes
item.description: Range 8", wounds on a 4+, no AS, Thrown weapon, Dangerous.

item.name: Bow of the Hunt
item.description: Range 30", S4, no AS

item.name: Burning Sun
item.description: causes D3 wounds

item.name: Call of the Morning Prayer
Call of the Morn. Prayer
item.description: Ward Save (4+)

item.name: Chain of the Dervish
item.description: At the start of any turn of any player the model can use the Chain of the Dervish. Bearer and unit become immune to psychology until the bearers next turn. One use only.

item.name: Concealed
item.description: Instead of deploying this model during setup, it can start the game concealed in any friendly infantry unit (type: Inf). No more than one model can be hidden in a unit. A Master Hashashin does not count to the limit of character models per unit but no more than one Master Hashashin may be part of a unit (hidden or not) at any time. The Araby player may reveal the Master Hashashin at the start of any of his turns or at the start of any combat phase. When the Master Hashashin is revealed place it in btb with the enemy (cc) or in the front rank of the unit (when the unit is not in cc). If possible, a rank and file model of the unit is placed in the back of the unit to make space, if not a character model may be moved. If the unit, the Master Hashashin is hiding in, is destroyed before the Master Hashashin is revealed, the Master Hashashin is lost and counts as a casualty. A concealed Master Hashashin cannot be damaged in any kind of way.

item.name: Crescent Armour
item.description: Heavy armour, reroll failed AS

item.name: Crystal Ball
item.description: Enemy must reveal all secrets (i.e. magic items, hidden models, etc.) within 24" of the bearer at any time.

item.name: Dagger of Time
item.description: Ward Save (5+), bearer automatically passes all characteristic tests (except Ld)

item.name: Dispel Scroll
item.description: Automatically dispels one spell without the need of DD. One use only.

item.name: Djinn
item.description: - Djinns count as daemons and are affected by effects that affect daemons. - Daemonic Ward Save (5+) - Magical Attacks - Immune to Psychology - Instability - This unit cannot be joined by character models - Bound Daemon: - At the start of each turn where there is no Magician left in the army, this unit suffers D3 wounds with no saves allowed (allocated like ranged attacks). - Bound Daemons only benefit from Inspiring Presence and Hold Your Ground! if the general or the BSB respectively has the Magician special rule.

item.name: Djinn Water
item.description: magical attacks

item.name: Djinnslayer
item.description: Hits always wound on 4+. AS modification as per strength of the bearer. Versus models with a Daemonic Ward Save, each wound inflicted (after saves) causes 2 wounds.

item.name: Dust of Bel Aliad
item.description: Models on foot only. Ward Save (3+) vs ranged attacks and spells.

item.name: Enchanted Shield
item.description: Shield that grants +2 AS

item.name: Eye of the Basilik
item.description: At the start of any turn of any player the model can use the eye to cause Fear until the end of turn. If the model is part of a unit, the unit also causes Fear. One use only.

item.name: Falcon Amulet
item.description: The first time in the game, the bearer suffers one or more wounds (after saves), reduce the number of wounds suffered by 1 (down to a minimum of 0). The wound saved in this way does not count towards combat resolution.

item.name: Feigned Flight
item.description: This unit may choose Flee as a charge response and automatically rallies in its next rally phase (even if its unit size is below 25%) if it is not caught. It is also free to move during the remaining moves part of the movement phase (even if it is not Light Cavalry). Grand General: If this model is the general of the army, its range for Inspiring Presence is 18".

item.name: Gaze of the Basilisk
item.description: Poisoned Attacks (3)

item.name: Grand Vizier
item.description: If this model joins a unit, the unit gains Immune to Psychology.

item.name: Great Shield
item.description: Shield which grants an additional bonus of +1AS vs attacks directed against the front of the model. For ranged attacks this is the case if the shooting model is located in the front arc of the model with the Great Shield. Attacks using the template rules ignore this additional bonus.

item.name: Gregarious Animal
item.description: War Elephants ignore panic caused by units other than War Elephants. Further, a War Elephant suffers -1 to Ld-tests and break tests for each broken War Elephant (friend or foe) within 12".

item.name: Howdah
item.description: If this model is used as a mount for a character, the character gets +1AS or a 4+ armour save which cannot be improved. Further, ranged attacks only hit the character on a 6 (instead of 5-6) when ranged hits are randomised between the mount and the character.

item.name: Ivory Amulet
item.description: Ward Save (5+), MR2

item.name: Luckstone
item.description: Reroll one dice used to cast or dispel (BM or PM). Can prevent miscasts and cause irresistible force. One use only.

item.name: Magic Carpet
item.description: The magic carpet grants the model a Ward Save (4+) vs ranged attacks and spells. The model cannot be barded.

item.name: Magician
item.description: In each own magic phase, each Magician may once try to heal a single friendly Djinn unit. Hereto the Magician nominates a friendly Djinn unit as the target and chooses any number of PD from the PD pool to be used for healing. If the target unit is within 12", roll the chosen PD: for each 1 the target unit suffers a wound with no saves allowed, for each 2-6 the target unit regains (heals) 1W but no additional models can be created. If the target unit is not within 12", the healing automatically fails and the PD are lost without any effect.

item.name: Mirage Banner
item.description: At the start of each close combat phase (timing step 1) all units in BTB with the unit containing this banner must pass a leadership test or suffer -1 to their to-hit rolls for the following combat phase.

item.name: No Leader
item.description: This model may never be the army general. Also, units cannot use this models Ld for Ld-tests and this model does not allow a unit to rally below 25%.

item.name: Potion of Strength
item.description: Use at the start of any cc phase. The model gains +3S until the end of turn. One use only.

item.name: Power Stone
item.description: +2PD to cast a spell. Dice used may exceed maximum allowed by level. One use only.

item.name: Ring of Fire
item.description: Use at the start of any close combat phase. Models with a Daemonic Ward Save hit the bearer only with natural 6s in cc. Lasts until the the bearers next magic phase. One use only.

item.name: Roc Feather
item.description: MR1

item.name: Rod of the Hermit
item.description: +1 to cast (BM and PM)

item.name: Sandstorm Banner
item.description: Unit causes Fear.

item.name: Sandworm Slime
item.description: Killing Blow

item.name: Scorpion Banner
item.description: All models in the unit gain AP(1) for cc attacks.. If the unit already has AP then the AP value is increased by 1.

item.name: Scorpion Stinger
item.description: AP (1)

item.name: Shaik
item.description: Each cavalry unit (type Cav) accompanied by a Shaik at the end of deployment gains the following respective advantage as long as the Shaik is part of the unit: - A cavalry unit (type: Cav) with the Heavy Cavalry special rule loses this special rule. - A cavalry unit (type: Cav) with the Light Cavalry special rule gains +2 Movement Allowance (M). - A cavalry unit (type: Cav) with neither the Light Cavalry nor the Heavy Cavalry special rule gains the ability "Free reforms" of the Light Cavalry special rule. The effects of multiple Shaiks in a single unit are not cumulative.

item.name: Shield of the Basilik
item.description: Shield. At the start of each cc phase each model in btb has to take a Ld test. If failed the respective model loses 1A until the end of the combat phase. Has no effect on mounts and models that are immune to psychology.

item.name: Smoke Bombs
item.description: Whenever this model flees from a combat that it was fighting in alone, all units that like to pursue have to roll a D6: on a roll of 1-3: the unit is not allowed to pursue (even if it would be forced to by a special rule like Hatred or Frenzy), 4-6: the Smoke Bombs have no effect.

item.name: Staff of Sorcery
item.description: +1 to total roll to attempt to dispel a spell.

item.name: Stampede
item.description: A broken War Elephant is not destroyed when it contacts an enemy unit with US equal and greater than 5 during flight and instead flees through this unit. Further, a War Elephant causes D3+2 Impact Hits to any unit (friend or foe) it flees through. Broken War Elephants suffer -3 to rally tests.

item.name: Star of El-Kalabad
item.description: At the start of your turn nominate one wizard on the table that has to pass a Ld-test on 3D6 or cannot cast spells in its next magic phase. One use only.

item.name: Stoneskin PM 2/6+
Stoneskin PM 3/6+
item.description: Augment, Range 18", unit gets a Ward Save (5+) until the casters next magic phase. Has no effect on character models.

item.name: Sword of Abu Raschid
item.description: +1S, ASF

item.name: Sword of Faith
item.description: Hits on 2+, cannot be modified

item.name: Sword of Righteous Fury
item.description: Reroll failed to wound rolls.

item.name: Tailwind PM 2/5+
Tailwind PM 3/5+
item.description: Augment, Range 18", unit gets +2M (up to M 11) until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: Viper Bow
item.description: Range 24", S3, Poisoned Attacks (1)

item.name: Viper Shield
item.description: Shield. Models that attack this model in cc suffer a S3 hit for each successful hit.

item.name: Vipers Bite
item.description: Poisoned Attacks (1)

item.name: Volley Fire
item.description: If the unit did not move, up to half (rounding up) of the models from the second rank may also fire their ranged weapons in the shooting phase.

item.name: War Banner
item.description: +1CR

item.name: Windrider PM 2/4+
Windrider PM 3/4+
item.description: Augment, cast on itself or friendly character model on foot with US1 (in both cases) within 12", model may immediately make a 20" fly movement. This move can be used to leave cc but cannot be used to enter combat (i.e. charging is not possible).

item.name: Wizards Staff
item.description: Bearer may use one more PD to cast spells than his level allows (BM only).
